title: Crime Analyst - Trailer 002 | Case 001: The Forgotten Victims
description:
Announcing the first case...

Come join me, Laura Richards, in the intelligence cell, as I deconstruct one of the most misunderstood cases of our time. It will literally blow your mind.

The first episode of Crime Analyst drops January 8 2021.

Subscribe, download and listen for free by searching for Crime Analyst on your preferred podcast app on Apple or Android devices.

You can also listen on iTunes, Spotify, Stitcher or on Crime-Analyst.com

Be Curious.

Ask Questions.

Always Trust Your Instincts.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
